(186)                           "Elmshaven", Sanitarium, Calif. K. 233'05                       August 9, 1905. 

Dear Brother and Sister Kress.-- 
     ....I wish to say to you that if God opens the way for the brethren in other parts of Australia to purchase property that may be used for sanitarium work, such as the place that Brother Semmens has written about, forbid them not. Utter not one word of remonstrance. There are many cities to be worked, and medical missionary work is not to be confined to a few centers.
